description: This file implements the Monitor plugin component for a WPEFramework-based application, providing functionality for registering RPC endpoints, handling operations like restart limits and statistics reset, and emitting events related to monitor actions.

classes.name: Monitor
classes.description: A class implementing monitoring functionalities including registration of RPC endpoints, retrieving and resetting plugin statistics, and emitting action events.

methods.name: void RegisterAll()
methods.description: Registers all RPC endpoints and properties provided by the Monitor class.

methods.name: void UnregisterAll()
methods.description: Unregisters all previously registered RPC endpoints.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_restartlimits(const RestartlimitsParamsData & params)
methods.description: Sets new restart limits for a plugin identified by the callsign.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData & params,InfoInfo & response)
methods.description: Resets statistics (memory and process info) for a plugin, returning the reset info.

methods.name: uint32_t get_status(const string & index,Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo> & response) const
methods.description: Retrieves current memory and process statistics for a plugin or all plugins.

methods.name: void event_action(const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)
methods.description: Emits an event indicating an action taken by the monitor for a specific plugin.

ctags.name: endpoint_resetstats
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData& params, InfoInfo& response/

ctags.name: event_action
ctags.pattern: /^    void Monitor::event_action(const string& callsign, const string& action, const string& reaso/
ctags.signature: (const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)

ctags.name: get_status
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::get_status(const string& index, Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo>& response)/
